TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TemplateStack extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a last-in-first-out (LIFO) collection of template files.

Docs.param: The HTTP context that contains the stack that stores the template files.
Docs.summary: Returns the current template file from the specified HTTP context.
Docs.returns: The template file, removed from the top of the stack.

Public Shared Function Pop (httpContext As HttpContextBase) As ITemplateFile

Docs.param: The HTTP context that contains the stack that stores the template files.
Docs.summary: Removes and returns the template file that is at the top of the stack in the specified HTTP context.
Docs.returns: The template file, removed from the top of the stack.
